metadata.title: RZ/N2L cannot access EEPROM on the RZ/N2L RSK board. What could be the cause?

sections.content:
Question:
RZ/N2L cannot access EEPROM on the RZ/N2L RSK board. What could be the cause?
Answer:
There are two types of EEPROM sizes: 16kbit and 32kbit. Please refer to the following and configure the software settings according to the EEPROM size.
[RZ/N2L RSK board]
Serial No. of boards with 16kbit: 241783~241882, 243167~243266
Serial No. for boards with 32kbit: other than above
Refer to the following page.
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/tnn/notes-renesas-starter-kit-rzn2l-differences-eeprom-size?r=1622401
Suitable Products
RZ/N2L
RZ/N2L cannot access EEPROM on the RZ/N2L RSK board. What could be the cause?
